thread.title: Memorial Service for Russia's UN Ambassador Churkin in Moscow
thread.title_full: Memorial Service for Russia's UN Ambassador Churkin in Moscow

title: Memorial Service for Russia's UN Ambassador Churkin in Moscow
text:
1 102 1 0 A memorial service for Vitaly Churkin, the late Russian ambassador to the United Nations, is taking place in Moscow's Central Clinic Hospital. Ваш браузер не поддерживает данный формат видео. ( 0:00 / .00Mb / просмотров видео: 59) Sputnik. © Sputnik. Memorial Service for Russia's UN Ambassador Churkin in Moscow 
Churkin died at his workplace in New York on Monday, a day before his 65th birthday. He had served as Russia's permanent envoy to the United Nations and Russian representative in the UN Security Council since April 2006. ...
